Headline: Pink Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change on Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are rerouted to the Outer Loop (Brown Line side) due to track maintenance near Adams/Wabash. Board Pink Line trains on the Brown Line side.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are operating with delays near Adams/Wabash. Pink Line trains have been rerouted downtown via the Outer Loop track (Brown Line side). Board all Pink Line trains on the Brown Line side. 

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
